title: American College of Rheumatology - ANA sub-serologies Testing Implementation
description: A guideline object provides the evidence-based recommendation for Tests for anti-nuclear antibody (ANA) sub-serologies (including antibodies to double-stranded DNA, Smith, RNP, SSA, SSB, Scl-70, centromere) depending on the presence of a positive ANA and clinical suspicion of immune-mediated disease.
keywords: Labwise, Choosing Wisely, ANA, ANA sub-serologies
